content: crochet this cute heart filet crochet baby blanket pattern this is such a fun baby blanket to make **this blanket includes a unique quick way to read and crochet your blanket even faster ** - paid version only **multiples are also included in this pattern** - paid version only ** paid version - get link in blog post finished size 34 25 x 33 inches approx yarn stylecraft special aran hook 5mm us h/8 type of instructions this pattern has simple easy to follow written instructions and does not include any charts the pattern is written using american standard crochet terms delivery instant pdf download shop download crochet languages english only terms of use for personal use only do not copy share or sell the pattern in part or whole you may sell the finished item made using this pattern refund policy all digital sales are final pattern support & questions email hellotrulycrochet at gmail com about truly crochet is my blog where i share my latest free crochet blanket patterns this version on etsy is an ad-free version of my free pattern https //trulycrochet com/
